description: This instrumentation enables spans for GraphQL Java operations.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.graphql.query-sanitizer.enabled
configurations.description: Enables sanitization of sensitive information from queries so they aren't added as span attributes.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.graphql.add-operation-name-to-span-name.enabled
configurations.description: Whether GraphQL operation name is added to the span name. WARNING: The GraphQL operation name is provided by the client and can have high cardinality. Use only when the server is not exposed to malicious clients.
